menupopup.onpopupshowing: (() => { let browser = gBrowser || getPanelBrowser(); gFxAccounts.populateSendTabToDevicesMenu(event.target, browser.currentURI.spec, browser.contentTitle); })()

menubar.onpopupshowing: if (event.target.parentNode.parentNode == this && !('@mozilla.org/widget/nativemenuservice;1' in Cc)) this.setAttribute('openedwithkey', event.target.parentNode.openedWithKey);
